A: When the pandemic hampered cross-border movements, some Western countries began to tout protectionism & even cried that ‚Äúglobalization is dead‚Äù. In response to this, I would like to stress the following 3 points.

As long as two countries abide by basic norms of international relations, respect each other‚Äôs sovereignty & territorial integrity, commit to non-interference, equality, mutual benefit & win-win cooperation, & properly handle differences, bilateral relations will move forward.

Peace&development remain themes of our times, but risks & challenges exist. World enters a period of turbulence & transformation & international landscape is shifting profoundly. China is an important force for progress & will contribute more to development & progress of mankind.

#Covid-19 poses major challenges to the health of mankind, dealt a severe blow to the world economy, put global governance to severe tests. It has driven home the fact that mankind belongs to a community with a shared future.

E-commerce plays a pivotal role in China‚Äôs dual-circulation policy. It is a strong driver for domestic consumption, & at the same time, provides a vital platform for businesses around the world to access the Chinese market as they seek to revive amid the pandemic.

Q: What can be done to build a healthy national mentality?
A: One must not live in the 21st century but leave one‚Äôs head in the past & fill it with Cold War & zero-sum mentality. A country can truly be great & strong only when its people are cool-headed & confident.

Q: What‚Äôs your comment on the concept of BRICS?
A: The concept of #BRICS reflects the trend of history. Cooperation under #BRICS framework has yielded fruitful results. #BRICS has a bright development prospect.

Q: Your take on #DualCirculation.
A: This is a new development paradigm: Domestic circulation is mainstay; domestic & international circulations reinforce each other. It is a strategic decision to reshape China‚Äôs international cooperation & cultivate new competitive edges.

BRICS will continue to enhance cooperation in political security, trade, finance, people-to-people exchange & public health, advance multilateralism, promote global economic recovery & political solutions to hotspots & shoulder responsibilities for world peace and development.

They should come together to uphold #multilateralism and oppose unilateralism and bullying, to uphold solidarity and cooperation and oppose confrontation, and to support mutual learning between civilizations and oppose the creation of barriers.

Q: What consensuses and actions do we need to promote healthy development of international community?
A: To achieve healthy development in the #PostPandemic era, I believe the international community must work in concert.
